The Media Interface.

Function Documentation

int32 rtk_SetSessionInactive ( uint32  chid,
uint32  sid 
)

Set Sessions to be Inactive.

This API used to inactive specified session, so all connections (RTP/RTCP/T.38) will be released and codec will stop.

Parameters
chidThe channel number.
sidThe session number. Usually 0 for master session, 1 for slave(conference) session.
Return values
0Success
